snippet: The former Williams driver, who lost his seat after the 2011 season, will race for KV Racing Technology with his countryman Tony Kanaan.
abstract: The former Williams driver, who lost his seat after the 2011 season, will race for KV Racing Technology with his countryman Tony Kanaan.

headline.main: Rubens Barrichello, Formula One Veteran, to Compete in IndyCar in 2012
